attributes.action: make it illegal to participate in any judicial killing, so that any politician or official involved in executing prisoners around the world would be arrested and prosecuted if they enter the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The death penalty is barbaric and indefensible.  As the British government maintains a long standing opposition to it, they should also be able to prosecute its practitioners who kill people abroad.  This would include any US president or state governor who has failed to commute even one death penalty.
